assets package

Contains buttons, colors, fonts, and images.

assets.buttons module

! @brief Buttons and imgs @file buttons.py This file contains:

-> A generic class for buttons

-> Button definitions for all pages

@dir assets Contains buttons, colors, fonts, and images.
